description: ESLint configuration file for a Svelte project using TypeScript and various plugins, detailing rules, parser options, and file inclusion/ignores.

methods.name: ts.config
methods.description: Configures ESLint with multiple rule sets and plugin configurations.

methods.name: includeIgnoreFile
methods.description: Includes ignore patterns from a specified file into ESLint configuration.

methods.name: fileURLToPath
methods.description: Converts a file URL to a file path string.
